mean_cn: n. 求爱，求爱时期，交往期间
mean_en: the activities that occur when people are developing a romantic relationship that could lead to marriage or the period of time when such activities occur
word_etyma: court求爱+ship名词后缀→求爱，求爱时期
sentence: Their courtship lasted for two years.
sentence_trans: 他们的交往持续了两年。
